title: Blue Sea Systems 5026 ST Blade Fuse Block 12 Circuit with Ground and Cover
description: Blue Sea Systems Fuse Block ST Blade Battery Terminal Mount 4 Circuit Kit , part number 5024, allows you to easily add 4 fused circuits to the terminal of a battery. Max Amps: 100A per block, 30A per circuit, Max Volts: 32V DC, Mounting hole: 3/8" (M10) stud, Screw Terminal Torque: 18in-lb, Screw terminal type: #8-32 screws. Mounts on the battery terminal stud and provides power to new accessories in your boat or vehicle. Ignition Protected–meets ISO 8846 and SAE J1171 for use in a gasoline engine compartment. ABYC/USCG compliant insulating cover, 4-circuit negative busbar, write on labels, and four 16-14 AWG and four 12-10 AWG Nylon insulated ring terminals included.
